data.title: José Ferrer
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of José Ferrer on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 95% The Caine Mutiny (1954)

Lowest Rated: 9% The Swarm (1978)

Birthday: Jan 8, 1912

Birthplace: Santurce, Puerto Rico

Broadway actor-director-producer whose noteworthy stage performances include Iago to Paul Robeson's "Othello" (1942), a Tony-winning "Cyrano de Bergerac" (1946) and the prince in the Noel Coward musical, "The Girl Who Came to Supper" (1964).

Highest rated movies

95% The Caine Mutiny 93% Lawrence of Arabia

92% Whirlpool

90% Joan of Arc

80% Nine Hours to Rama

77% Voyage of the Damned

75% Bloody Birthday
